alert.note: Alert for Irion; Schleicher; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:08PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Schleicher, southeastern Tom Green and southeastern Irion Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 508 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Knickerbocker, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Christoval and Knickerbocker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
